description:
GuySpy is gay mobile, GPS dating like no other. Use your iPhone, iPad or iPad Touch to find gay men near you for flirting, social connections, a quick hookup or long-term love. It’s the best free gay dating app for gay, bi or curious men who are seeking other men.

Compare us to Grindr, Scruff, Hornet, Jack’d and other similar apps- GuySpy has way more free features to help you find other men YOUR way. With the ability to upload multiple photos, record and receive voice messages, text & chat with tons of guys, exchange videos and instantly send your location, GuySpy is the ultimate gay app to meet other m4m. Whether you identify as gay, homosexual, queer, bi, curious or even straight - if you’re feeling horny or even lonely - this is the hot guy finder that will connect you with real guys you are really interested in- right now.

Reveal your exact location on our interactive map or be discreet and simply browse men that fit your search filter criteria.  With our free Travel Mode you can even change your city to where you are going…or where you want to be!

Cruise the latest, sexiest photos of guys from our global community. Enhance your chats with video in stunning HD. Find the guy you really want using our extensive new search filters including ethnicity, positions, what you’re into and distance away- the choice is all yours.

Upgrade to GuySpy+ to: 
•        See who’s been checking out your profile
•        See who’s added you as a favorite
•        See who’s liked your photos
•        Browse & Cruise way more guys
•        Get VIP access to the newest GuySpy guys
•        Get notifications when your favorite guys are online
•        Reverse filtering, so you can choose who can find you (including by distance)
•        Anonymous browsing, so you can check out other guys without them knowing it.



...

GuySpy+ costs USD $3.99/week, $6.99/month, or $59.99/year.

GuySpy+ is valid for 7 days, 1 month, or 1 year, depending on the subscription selected. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged the subscription amount for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the Account Settings screen in the App Store app on your device after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. The GuySpy privacy policy is available at: http://www.guyspy.com/privacy-policy/. The GuySpy user agreement is available at: http://www.guyspy.com/user-agreement/

releaseNotes: In addition to fixing some bugs and improving performance, this version brings a major overhaul in the look and feel of GuySpy, as well as improved search and profile screens and lots of enhancements to the map view.  We really hope you love it!
